project_descr: Priming Financial Instruments and Markets to Reduce Emissiones from Deforestation

outputs.output_descr: This project aims to contribute to reduce GHG emissions from land use and forestry, while ensuring its own sustainable development, through promotion of forest conservation and restoration & supporting more sustainable agricultural practices.
